name: Simple farming simulator game
description:
Hi,  I made this simple farming system in Unity in 4 days!

You can play and enjoy or you can download the source file and see how I made this, I hope you enjoy and learn something from this simple project :)

Controls:

W : move up

S : move down

A : move left

D : move right

Left Mouse Click : interact

use the number keys or mouse wheel : to select item in the inventory

E : Open chest

*   top down character controls

* simple farming system(plant , watering , growth , harvesting)

* simple store system(buy , sell).

* simple quest system.

* simple inventory system.
